metadata.title: CVE-2024-52006 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Git may pass on Carriage Returns via the credential protocol tocredential helpers which use line-reading functions thatinterpret said Carriage Returns as line endings, even though Gitdid not intend that.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-52006` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

git - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
git-all - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
git-cvs - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
git-daemon-run - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
git-daemon-sysvinit - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
git-email - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
git-gui - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
git-man - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
git-mediawiki - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
git-svn - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
gitk - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
gitweb - 1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: git package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.45.2-1ubuntu1.1').
